message.content:
cs.LG, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.SI 

The paper presents a new approach for constructing and training neural networks, specifically single layer networks with ReLU activation function. This falls under the category of machine learning and artificial intelligence, which is covered by several sub-categories in arXiv CS. The most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), followed by cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) and cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) since the paper deals with neural networks and their applications. The paper also mentions the use of a dictionary and integral representation, which are techniques commonly used in signal processing and image analysis, hence cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.SI (Signal and Image Processing) are also likely sub-categories.
